lyrics.text:
Ko e me’a lelei lahi,
Pea angatonu,
Ki he kakai kotoa pē
Ke kau ki he lotu.

Ko e lotu Folofola
‘A hotau ‘Otua
Ko e koloa totonu
Ki he laumālie.

He ‘oku fai ‘a e lotu
‘A hotau ‘Otua,
Hangē ko e Folofola
‘A ‘ene ‘Afio.

He ko hono fakama’unga
‘A e Folofola,
Mo hono faka’ilonga
Ke tau ‘ilo ia.

Ko e afo kuo falō
‘A e Folofola,
Ko e me’a fua ia
Ki he laumālie.

‘Oku tupu ‘i he lotu,
‘A hotau ‘Otua
‘A e poto ke tau ‘ilo,
‘A ‘ene ‘Afio.

’Oku ngāue ‘i loto
‘A e Folofola,
‘O ne fakatupu fo’ou
‘A e angahala.
